name: Crazy Ragdoll
description:
Recommended screen size 1920 * 1080.

This a fun game where you get demolish ragdolls for fun.  You can use a variety of tools to hurt the ragdolls and you can use them on two different types of ragdoll (normal and titan). There is even a chaos mode. You can change the camera angle and even become a ragdoll. There is also a hidden ragdoll.

I will release update if the game gets 10 downloads.
